instructions:
Compatible with Fate Core games.
* Maintains the look and feel of the official character sheet from Evil Hat.
* Built-in roll buttons and templates for easy use of Skills and results stand out.
* Fully customisable Skills, Stunts and Stress.
* Code based from DnD 5th edition sheet and the previous Fate Core sheet from Andrew Bailey (krathognis), Devindra Payment (@Ardnived), Maetco, and Joseph Cloutier (player-03)

useroptions.description: Show hints that might be useful for first time players or those upgrading from the previous sheet design.
Run scripts to setup the sheet for a default character.
When setting up a default sheet, what stress tracks and their guiding skill should be set up? e.g. "Mental:Will,Extra:3"
When setting up a default sheet, what consequences are the default consequences? e.g. "2,4,6"
Use the Conditions from the Fate Toolkit to replace Consequences
If you are starting with a Phase 0, then you can use this tab to build up your ideas.
Set this if you would prefer the notes to show on a Tab of their own.
